subject: College Athletics
Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers, ranked fourth, will travel to Hartford on Monday to play No. 1 Connecticut in a battle for bragging rights and, possibly, for first place in the Big East.
snippet: Rutgers, ranked fourth, will travel to Hartford on Monday to play No. 1 Connecticut in a battle for bragging rights and, possibly, for first place in the Big East.
